title: baked sea bass with warm artichoke and bacon salad
description: Baking a whole fish in salt helps retain the meat's moisture. James Martin's recipe is infused with basil and lemon.
ingredients: 1 x 2kg/4lb 8oz whole sea bass, scales and guts removed, cleaned (ask your fishmonger to do this for you if you prefer)
200g/7oz smoked back bacon, cut into lardons
1 x 280g jar roasted artichokes in olive oil
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
